summary: CAME HOME 8 PM.  SON CAME HOME SHORTLY AFTER 10 PM.  JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT MY CAR ALARM STARTED GOING OFF (CAR LOCKED AND PARKED IN DRIVEWAY), I GOT OUT OF BED LOOKED THROUGH BLINDS AND SAW MY CAR WAS ON FIRE.  I RAN TO KITCHEN GRABBED FIRE EXTINGUISHER ATTEMPTED TO PUT OUT FIRE AND CALLED 911.  FIRE DEPT DETERMINED FIRE STARTED INSIDE CAR AT WIRING AREA.
